com.bandyer.core_av.room

Interface Room


  • public Room

    This class represents a Bandyer room where the users will join and talk.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Room.Registry
      A factory used to get rooms

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Room.Registry Registry
      A factory used to get rooms

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Room addRoomObserver(RoomObserver observer)
      Method to add an observer to the room. The observer will be notified when a change has occurred
      Publisher create(BaseUser user)
      Method to create a room actor given a user
      Subscriber create(Stream stream)
      Method to create a room actor given a stream
      java.util.List<com.bandyer.core_av.room.RoomActor> getAllActors()
      Method to get the current list of publishers&subscribers in the room
      Publisher getPublisher(Stream stream)
      Method to get the current publisher in the room.
      java.util.List<com.bandyer.core_av.publisher.Publisher> getPublishers()
      Method to get the current list of publishers in the room
      RoomInfo getRoomInfo()
      Represents the properties of the room, which are set after the user has joined in.
      RoomState getRoomState()
      Current room state, default value is RoomState.DISCONNECTED
      java.util.List<com.bandyer.core_av.Stream> getStreams()
      Method to get the current remote streams in the room. ( Publisher stream excluded )
      Subscriber getSubscriber(Stream stream)
      Method to get a subscriber given a stream
      java.util.List<com.bandyer.core_av.subscriber.Subscriber> getSubscribers()
      Method to get the current list of subscribers in the room
      void join()
      Method to connect and join to the room created. This method must be called if you want to setup a call.
      void leave()
      Method to dispose everything, usually used when you want to close the call.
      void muteAllPublishersAudio(boolean mute)
      Utility method to mute the audio for all publishers
      void muteAllPublishersVideo(boolean mute)
      Utility method to mute the video for all publishers
      void muteAllSubscribersAudio(boolean mute)
      Utility method to mute the audio for all subscribers
      void muteAllSubscribersVideo(boolean mute)
      Utility method to mute the video for all subscribers
      void muteAudioAllActors(java.lang.Boolean microphone, java.lang.Boolean speaker)
      Utility method to mute the audio for all room actors, publishers and subscribers
      void publish(Publisher publisher)
      Method used to add a new publisher in the room.
      Room removeRoomObserver(RoomObserver observer)
      Method to remove an observer, usually used when not interested anymore in any event coming from the room.
      void subscribe(Subscriber subscriber)
      Method used to add a new subscriber in the room.
      void unpublish(Publisher publisher)
      Method used to remove a publisher from the room
      void unsubscribe(Subscriber subscriber)
      Method to remove a subscriber from the room. Generally used when you are not anymore interested in a remote stream.

    • Field Detail

      • Registry

        static Room.Registry Registry

        A factory used to get rooms

    • Method Detail

      • getRoomState

        RoomState getRoomState()

        Current room state, default value is RoomState.DISCONNECTED

      • getRoomInfo

        RoomInfo getRoomInfo()

        Represents the properties of the room, which are set after the user has joined in.

      • join

        void join()

        Method to connect and join to the room created. This method must be called if you want to setup a call.

      • leave

        void leave()

        Method to dispose everything, usually used when you want to close the call.

      • subscribe

        void subscribe(Subscriber subscriber)

        Method used to add a new subscriber in the room.

        Parameters:
        subscriber - A subscriber to a remote stream
        Throws:
        - The Subscriber has already been used
        - The stream which the subscriber is linked to is not correct
        - Another subscriber is already attached to the same stream

      • unsubscribe

        void unsubscribe(Subscriber subscriber)

        Method to remove a subscriber from the room. Generally used when you are not anymore interested in a remote stream.

        Parameters:
        subscriber - Subscriber to un-subscribe

      • create

        Publisher create(BaseUser user)

        Method to create a room actor given a user

        Parameters:
        user - the roomActor refers to
        Returns:
        Publisher created

      • create

        Subscriber create(Stream stream)

        Method to create a room actor given a stream

        Parameters:
        stream - Stream the roomActor refers to
        Returns:
        Subscriber to that stream

      • publish

        void publish(Publisher publisher)

        Method used to add a new publisher in the room.

        Parameters:
        publisher - The publisher to be added in the room
        Throws:
        - The Publisher has already been used
        - You can't have two publishers, you need first to unpulish the old one
        - The publisher does not have a capturer set

      • unpublish

        void unpublish(Publisher publisher)

        Method used to remove a publisher from the room

        Parameters:
        publisher - Publisher to un-publish

      • getSubscribers

        java.util.List<com.bandyer.core_av.subscriber.Subscriber> getSubscribers()

        Method to get the current list of subscribers in the room

        Returns:
        Unmodifiable list of subscribers

      • getPublisher

        Publisher getPublisher(Stream stream)

        Method to get the current publisher in the room.

        Returns:
        publisher The publisher that has been set for the room.

      • getPublishers

        java.util.List<com.bandyer.core_av.publisher.Publisher> getPublishers()

        Method to get the current list of publishers in the room

        Returns:
        Unmodifiable list of publishers

      • getStreams

        java.util.List<com.bandyer.core_av.Stream> getStreams()

        Method to get the current remote streams in the room. ( Publisher stream excluded )

        Returns:
        Unmodifiable list of streams

      • getSubscriber

        Subscriber getSubscriber(Stream stream)

        Method to get a subscriber given a stream

        Parameters:
        stream - remote Stream
        Returns:
        subscriber or null if there is not a subscriber in the room attached to that stream

      • getAllActors

        java.util.List<com.bandyer.core_av.room.RoomActor> getAllActors()

        Method to get the current list of publishers&subscribers in the room

        Returns:
        Unmodifiable list of room actors

      • muteAllSubscribersAudio

        void muteAllSubscribersAudio(boolean mute)

        Utility method to mute the audio for all subscribers

        Parameters:
        mute - by default is set to true

      • muteAllSubscribersVideo

        void muteAllSubscribersVideo(boolean mute)

        Utility method to mute the video for all subscribers

        Parameters:
        mute - by default is set to true

      • muteAllPublishersAudio

        void muteAllPublishersAudio(boolean mute)

        Utility method to mute the audio for all publishers

        Parameters:
        mute - by default is set to true

      • muteAllPublishersVideo

        void muteAllPublishersVideo(boolean mute)

        Utility method to mute the video for all publishers

        Parameters:
        mute - by default is set to true

      • muteAudioAllActors

        void muteAudioAllActors(java.lang.Boolean microphone,
                        java.lang.Boolean speaker)

        Utility method to mute the audio for all room actors, publishers and subscribers

        Parameters:
        microphone - by default is set to true
        speaker - by default is set to true

      • addRoomObserver

        Room addRoomObserver(RoomObserver observer)

        Method to add an observer to the room. The observer will be notified when a change has occurred

        Parameters:
        observer - class interested
        Returns:
        Room

      • removeRoomObserver

        Room removeRoomObserver(RoomObserver observer)

        Method to remove an observer, usually used when not interested anymore in any event coming from the room.

        Parameters:
        observer - class not interested anymore
        Returns:
        Room
